com.polarion.platform.security

Class AdministrationPermission

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.polarion.platform.security.Permission
      • com.polarion.platform.security.AdministrationPermission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPermission

    public class AdministrationPermission
extends Permission
    Administration permission class.

    Available permissions:

    • com.polarion.administration.read - action is ACTION_READ
    • com.polarion.administration.modify - action is ACTION_MODIFY
    • com.polarion.administration.project.create - action is ACTION_PROJECT_CREATE
    Modify implies read and create project.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Stepan Roh, Polarion Software

      • getParentPermissions

        @NotNull
public IPermission[] getParentPermissions()
        Description copied from interface: IPermission
        The collection of permissions, to which the decision about this permission is granted, if there is no record for exactly this permission.

        For permission to be granted, none of it's parents can be denied and at least one of them must be granted. The rest can be either undefined or granted.

        Specified by:
        getParentPermissions in interface IPermission
        Overrides:
        getParentPermissions in class Permission
        Returns:
        array of IPermissions (not null)
